description: Roundleaf Liverleaf (Anemone americana) is an amazing plant that offers an array of delightful characteristics. Its glossy, nearly evergreen foliage emerges early in the spring, and its dainty, blue-white to pale pink flowers bloom through late spring and summer. The leaves form a low mound and have a distinctive rounder shape than most liverleaf species. Its tough, drought-tolerant nature make it both low-maintenance and long-lasting. They are deer and rabbit resistant, and can provide much-needed ground cover in hard to mow areas. With its gorgeous foliage and charming flowers, Roundleaf Liverleaf is a fantastic choice for any garden.
